posts.title: Artificial Intelligence and Origin of Life Prize, $10M USD
posts.author: gwerbret
posts.description: Where did life and the genetic code come from? Can the answer build superior AI? The #1 mystery in science now has a $10 million prize.

posts.title: Google begins showing ads in AI Mode (AI answers)
posts.author: nreece
posts.description: Google has started rolling out ads in AI mode, which is the company's "answer engine," not a search engine.

posts.title: Amazon's Layoffs Are Business as Usual, Not Omens of AI Doom
posts.author: wahnfrieden
posts.description: The recent round of Amazon corporate layoffs isn’t a sign of an imminent AI apocalypse. It's an expression of the company's brutal corporate culture, enabled by its use of the H-1B visa program.

posts.title: Suppressing ability to lie makes LLM more likely to claim it's conscious
posts.author: thomassmith65
posts.description: Leading AI models from OpenAI, Meta, Anthropic and Google described subjective, self-aware experiences when settings tied to deception and roleplay were turned down.
